# IBM Personality Insights sunburst diagrams in R

The goal of ibmsunburst is to wrap the javascript library that IBM have produced for making sunburst personality insights charts for use in R and rmarkdown documents.

## Typical htmlwidgets workflow
- :ballot_box_with_check: Identify JS source
- :ballot_box_with_check: Use htmlwidgets starter package
- :ballot_box_with_check: Add relevant JS files to inst
- :white_large_square: Include a sample dataset (see [ls examples](https://github.com/personality-insights/sunburst-chart/tree/master/docs/profiles) )
- :white_large_square: Adjust templates to incorporate JS lib
- :white_large_square: Prep any data transformation or specifications needed
- :white_large_square: Add testing and documentation
- :white_large_square: Prepare for CRAN
